title: 6 PCS Synthetic Straight Hair Extensions Clip in human hair 20 INCH 140 Gram Thick hairpieces Dark Brown Blonde Black Wigs with Comb for Women and Girls Full Head (20 INCH, Deep burgundy)
features: ✅【Fashion Hair Extension】 Each package weighs 140 grams and contains 6 Pcs Hair Extensions, including One 7-inch wide weft with 4 clips, Two 5-inch wide weft with 3 clips, and Three 3,5 inch wide wefts with 3 clips. The weight of the extensions is suitable for most people, If you feel it’s too heavy, You can reduce the number of pieces you wear, Or you can trim the length to reduce the weight.

✅【After Wearing Effect】Our hair extensions are designed to blend seamlessly with your natural hair, creating a realistic look that mimics your own hair. They can also enhance the appearance of your hair by adding length and thickness. These extensions are suitable for a variety of occasions and offer the flexibility to create different hairstyles and lengths to suit your personal preferences.

✅【how to care】Don't let shedding hold you back from achieving your desired look! Our hand-sewn clip-in hair extensions may shed a little when first used, but with a few simple steps you can keep them in top condition. Simply use a spray bottle to add some water, then gently brush with a wide tooth comb to prevent dryness and tangling. Keep your extensions looking beautiful and healthy with this easy maintenance routine.

✅【Advantages of 6PCS Clip in Extensions】This long hair straight extension is safer and more comfortable. Compared to traditional hair extensions,No tape,No glue, our hair extension only uses BB clips to fix,You don't need to rush to the Salon for a party, or be upset in an overslept morning; just spend 5 minutes to wear these hair pieces, then a charming and elegant look will appear.Time and money saver, no pressure, no damage to the scalp.

✅【Warm Tips&Service】We understand that color accuracy is important when it comes to hair extensions, and due to variations in lighting and display screens, there may be slight differences in the color of the product you receive. If you have any concerns or issues, please don't hesitate to contact us. We will do our best to assist you and address any problems within 24 hours. Your happiness and satisfaction is our top priority.
description: 1.Open the clips that are sewed on the weft.  2. Separate your hair. Starting at the lower back section of your head, use a tail comb to divide(horizontally part)your hair, at the lower back of the head i.e. just below one ear to the second ear. Also, you can start parting even lower, as low as you want to place the first weft. 3.Release the hair you held and then repeat the process above until you apply all hair extensions.

1. Remove the extensions at the end of the day before going to bed. Try not to wash your hair extensions.  2. Put the hair into a sealed poly-bag when you are not using it. Avoid letting the hair contact acid, alkaline or corrosive chemicals. 3.Avoid ironing the hair. Inappropriate high temperatures will harm the hair.
